name: Gale's Spring Prototype
description:
Gale's Spring is a meditative prototype built in Unity where the player controls Gale, an avatar of nature. By collecting rocks, Gale gains physical presence and the power to regrow a larger area of the Earth around them. 

This project was built and submitted for Studio 1, Masters of Animation, Games and Interactivity (RMIT), and is an exploration of mechanics and concepts for a larger game. 

DOWNLOADS

Note: I have provided a Windows and Mac build but do not have a Mac to test the project on. I've been told there may be some performance issues and troubles getting the app running. If you cannot get it to run on your Mac, check: 

System Preferences -> Security & Privacy -> General -> Allow apps downloaded from -> GalesSpring
